Weapon.Name: Flame of the Ancients
Weapon.Description: This sword is said to have been imbued with the eternal fire of a fallen star, burning with an unquenchable fury.
Weapon.WeaponCapabilities: Sets the target ablaze, dealing additional damage over time
Weapon.NarrativeLine: As the blade strikes, flames engulf the enemy, scorching their essence.

Weapon.Name: Whisperwind Dagger
Weapon.Description: A dagger so light, it cuts through the air silently, perfect for the hands of an assassin.
Weapon.WeaponCapabilities: Grants a chance to strike twice
Weapon.NarrativeLine: In a blink, the dagger finds its mark twice, as if guided by the wind itself.

Weapon.Name: Staff of the Cosmos
Weapon.Description: Channeling the energy of the cosmos, this staff allows its wielder to bend the fabric of reality.
Weapon.WeaponCapabilities: Summon a meteor shower upon foes
Weapon.NarrativeLine: The sky darkens as comets are called down to smite the enemy.
